DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate effectiveness evidence base exercise program shoulder impingement . Approximately 1 % adult consult General Practitioner ( GP ) shoulder pain year , make third common reason musculoskeletal GP consultation UK . A 50 % patient diagnose subacromial impingement syndrome ( SAIS ) ( shoulder impingement syndrome ) commonly refer physiotherapy treatment . This trial aim compare effectiveness evidence base exercise protocol usual physiotherapy care .
DOC.detailed_description: Physiotherapy management shoulder impingement frequently involve exercise , however little evidence underpin exercise prescription outcomes poor . Few trial investigate muscle target strengthen respect mode , frequency , duration , intensity progression . This randomize control trial ( RCT ) investigate effectiveness evidence base exercise program shoulder impingement . This research may impact physiotherapist provide exercise program patient shoulder impingement .
DOC.criteria: Patients must age 18 year old . Shoulder pain least 3/10 severity diagnose consultant rheumatologist , orthopaedic surgeon general practitioner within past 12 month . Positive HawkinsKennedy test . Positive test either supraspinatus ( empty test ) infraspinatus ( resisted external rotation neutral ) . Acute traumatic condition . Evidence rotator cuff tear ( positive drop arm test ) shoulder joint pathology ( e.g . adhesive capsulitis , labral tear ) . A history fracture upper arm , shoulder clavicle within past two year . A history dislocation shoulder within previous two year . Postoperative condition involve upper arm , shoulder clavicle . Inflammatory systemic disease . Current sign symptom acute nerve root pain arise cervical upper thoracic spine . Previous physiotherapy condition involve exercise regime . Previous corticosteroid injection affect shoulder within past 6 month . Unwilling participant .
